name: Frontier (itch) (Rampage_64)
description:
Find your way pass gunslingers to loot the safe and make a getaway in this simple stealth game. 

My first game ever. A very simple stealth game. Will update it in the future with some more levels!

All rights go to their rightful owners. I used music from The Good The Bad and the Ugly and Outlaws. All game meshes are from Synty Studios. Made on the Unreal Engine 4.
